title: I posted a similar question last month but got no replies. My Live Case/Live Earth case (with NFC button) abruptly stopped working app. 2 months ago. I have restarted the phone, removed and replaced the Live Case, uninstalled and reinstalled Live Case app. The NFC button still works as a shortcut button to other phone functions. Has Google stopped sending the Live Earth (Google Earth) images?
content: I posted a similar question last month but got no replies. My Live Case/Live Earth case (with NFC button) abruptly stopped working app. 2 months ago. I have restarted the phone, removed and replaced the Live Case, uninstalled and reinstalled Live Case app. The NFC button still works as a shortcut button to other phone functions. Has Google stopped sending the Live Earth (Google Earth) images?
